{"id":530215857,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1627577158,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/530215857/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Sudoku","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isSafe(vector<vector<char>>& board, int row, int col, char num)\n    {\n        for(int i = 0; i < 9; i++)\n        {\n            if(board[row][i] == num)\n                return false;\n        }\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < 9; i++)\n        {\n            if(board[i][col] == num)\n                return false;\n        }\n        \n        int rowStart = row - row % 3;\n        int colStart = col - col % 3;\n        for(int i = rowStart; i < rowStart + 3; i++)\n        {\n            for(int j = colStart; j < colStart + 3; j++)\n            {\n                if(board[i][j] == num)\n                    return false;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    bool isValidSudokuHelper(vector<vector<char>>& board, int row, int col) {\n        if(row == 8 && col == 9)\n            return true;\n        \n        if(col == 9)\n        {\n            row++;\n            col = 0;\n        }\n        \n        if(board[row][col] != '.')\n            return isValidSudokuHelper(board, row, col + 1);\n        \n        for(char i = 1 + '0'; i <= 9 + '0'; i++)\n        {\n            if(isSafe(board, row, col, i))\n            {\n                board[row][col] = i;\n                if(isValidSudokuHelper(board, row, col + 1))\n                    return true;\n            }\n            \n            board[row][col] = '.';\n        }\n        \n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    bool isValidSudoku(vector<vector<char>>& board) {\n        return isValidSudokuHelper(board, 0, 0);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-sudoku"}
